Key Match Events: The Astros scored four runs in the eighth inning to come from behind and win the game.
Kyle Isbel hit a three-run double for the Royals in the seventh inning to take a 3-2 lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Jeremy Peña and Mauricio Dubón made key contributions in the eighth inning to help the Astros win.
Astros manager Joe Espada expressed satisfaction with the team's comeback win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jason Heyward made a splash in his Astros debut with a two-run double.
Hunter Brown, pitching on his 26th birthday, had a strong outing for the Astros.
Others: Bobby Witt Jr. went 0 for 4 for the Royals after a 17-game hitting streak.
Alex Bregman was ejected in the fourth inning for arguing a strike-three call.
